description:
Given a rod of N units, The rod can be cut into different sizes and each size has a cost associated with it. Determine the maximum cost obtained by cutting the rod and selling its pieces. The cost of each size is represented by the an array of size N where A[i] , (0<=i<n ) denotes the size of the i+1 size

**Constraints :**

1<=N<=100

1<=A[i]<=100

**Example:**

**Input :**   
 6

3 5 6 7 10 12

**Output :**  
18
title: Rod cutting problem
